OLED.drawLine|block: draw line from:|x: $x0 y: $y0 to| x: $x1 y: $y1
OLED.drawRectangle|block: draw rectangle from:|x: $x0 y: $y0 to| x: $x1 y: $y1
tinkercademy.ADKeyboard|block: key %k | is pressed on ADKeyboard at pin %p
tinkercademy.MoistureSensor|block: value of moisture sensor at pin %p
tinkercademy.PIR|block: motion detector at pin %p | detects motion
